data.name: Hermea
data.detailed_description:
Race against the clock to deliver the gods' mail on time! Hermea is a third person speedrunner where you play as Hermea, an intern at Hermes' Delivery Service, who transports mail to Greek gods by traversing perilous environments on foot and using a variety of interchangeable abilities. The gods will throw everything they can at you to try and stop you, but with some encouraging words from Hermes, you can totally take them on!

Features:
  • 6 Action Packed Levels and a Tutorial Level
  • 3 Different Worlds Inspired by Greek Mythology
  • Useful and Diverse Abilities
  • Full Voice Acting
  • A Number of Accessibility Options so Every Gamer Can Play
  • Controller Support

data.short_description: Hermea is an intern at Hermes' Delivery Service who transports mail by traversing perilous environments on foot and using a variety of abilities. Control Hermea to race against the clock and deliver timely as a faster time will reward a better score in this third person speedrunning platformer!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7-4790k
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7-10750H
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 2070
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
